title: Spotify Clone
description: It's a lookalike of a famous Music Player Spotify by which we can hear any song.

title: Rock Paper Scissor
description: It's a game b/w a person & computer in which rock can break the scissor, scissor can cut the paper & paper can overshadow rock.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: It is two-player game in which the players fill up rectangles in a table with either an X or an O
